name: 2 By 2
description:
The Earth has come under 40 days and 40 nights of floods! You've already built the Ark for the animals, but some of them are now being shy, and not meeting their soul mates! If you are to help repopulate the earth, you're going to have to play animal match-maker, and help these animals meet their new partners!

Press and hold space to win!

2 By 2 is a game developed as part of the Global Game Jam 2020. With the theme being Repair our group decided to change it from fix to re-pair, like finding the missing sock.
